duties_responsibilities.duty: Staffing, scheduling, and processing payroll for all Security Professionals within assigned client sites.
Interviewing and hiring qualified applicants, evaluating low-performing employees for replacement, upgrade, or transfer.
Creating, modifying, and managing post schedules, ensuring adequate coverage at all times.
Managing branch overtime, maintaining a pool of rovers for backfill of vacant positions.
Processing payroll, ensuring records are properly maintained and updated, resolving payroll discrepancies in a timely manner.
Conducting disciplinary and counseling sessions, initiating termination procedures as needed.
Maintaining regular proactive contact with Security Professionals to ensure effective utilization and proper training.
Enforcing post-specific policies and procedures, maintaining a well-organized and effective working area.
Preparing and running all required reports, reviewing reports with the management team, and taking appropriate action as necessary.
Performing additional projects or tasks as directed by managers.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required. College degree or coursework desirable.
